attributes.action: limit MP salaries to GBP 2500 a month for as long as the Lockdown is maintained.
attributes.additional_details: MP’s should understand and be share the experience of the population during a time of crisis. The sacrifices being demanded of the population should be shared by all and MP’s should show that we’re all together in this.
attributes.background: Limit MP pay to the level they’ve enabled companies to pay employees by closing the entire economy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
